channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Taylor Swift Addresses Rumor She Turned Down the Super Bowl: ‘Nothing To Do With Travis’
item.description: 🔥 Taylor Swift sets the record straight on Super Bowl rumors! 💥 No bad blood here, just good music vibes! 🎶 #TaylorSwift #SuperBowlRumors

item.title: Rise Festival 2025 Rises Above Night 1 Weather Issues for an Elevated Desert Weekend With Rüfüs du Sol, Calvin Harris & John Mayer
item.description: 🌵🎶 Desert vibes and epic tunes at Rise Festival with Rüfüs du Sol, Calvin Harris, and John Mayer! Let's dance under the stars! ✨ #RiseFestival2025

item.title: GLAAD eBay Auction Includes Swag Signed by Adam Lambert, Sam Smith, Barbra Streisand & More
item.description: 🎶 Bid on iconic swag signed by your faves like Adam Lambert, Sam Smith, and more! Support GLAAD in style! 🌈 #MusicForACause

item.title: Impact Data & Events Launches; Announces FREE #iVoted NYC Concert at Irving Plaza w/ Lay Bankz, Connie Diiamond, and More
item.description: 🎉 Dance your way to the #iVoted NYC Concert at Irving Plaza with Lay Bankz, Connie Diiamond, and more! Let's party! 🎶💃 #ImpactDataEvents

item.title: Watch Bad Bunny Host, Doja Cat Perform “Aaahh Men!” and “Gorgeous” on Saturday Night Live
item.description: 🔥 Bad Bunny brings the heat and Doja Cat slays on SNL! 🎤 Did you catch the epic performances? 🌟 #BadBunny #DojaCat #SNL
